title: The Best Android Tablet for Drawing
description:
NEW COURSES: http://bradsartschool.com

There are several Android tablets out there right now designed for artists (and some that aren't but do it well anyway). Today I'm taking a look at the Samsung Galaxy tab s9 FE the XP-Pen Magic drawing pad and the Huion Kamvas Slate.
